
# password.proto API Document

*Document generated by protoc-gen-markdown. DO NOT EDIT!*

> APIs


* [Password](#password) - Account password service.


	* [Set (/account/password)](#set) - Set account password.


	* [Update (/account/password)](#update) - Update account password.


	* [Reset (/account/password)](#reset) - Reset account password.





<h2 id="password">Password</h2>

>  Account password service.



<h3 id="set">Set</h3>

>  Set account password.



* HTTP Gateway

	* URL: `/account/password`
	* Method: `POST`
	* Content-Type: `application/json`

* Request Type: ***PasswordRequest***

>  Account password request.

|Field|proto type|JSON type|Comment|Default|Required|
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
|password|string|string| Account password|-|true|
|old_password|string|string| Account old password|-|false|
|verify_code|string|string| Verify code|-|false|




> JSON Demo

```json
{
  "password": "string",
  "old_password": "string",
  "verify_code": "string"
}
```



* Response Type: ***Secret***

>  Account secret.

|Field|proto type|JSON type|Comment|Default|Required|
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
|token|string|string| Account token|-|true|



> JSON Demo

```json
{
  "token": "string"
}
```

>  Reset account password.



* HTTP Gateway

* Request Type: ***PasswordRequest***

|Field|proto type|JSON type|Comment|Default|Required|
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
